response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its true value to be well above $800,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $750,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you gain access to a high-quality solution tailored to meet your specific needs. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the offer.", "product_price": 750000}
